markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell. What four? Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and wrong view. Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.

Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven. What four? Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and right view. Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”

AN.4.213. Akataññutāsutta (“Ungrateful”)
